argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latref.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latref.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_latpos | |- ( K e. Lat -> K e. Poset ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_postr | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Y /\ Y .<_ Z ) -> X .<_ Z ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Y /\ Y .<_ Z ) -> X .<_ Z ) ) |
